tool_description: Determines primary skin type (normal, dry, oily, combination, sensitive) based on multiple skin characteristics and behavioral patterns.

tzone_oiliness.description: T-zone oil level on scale 1-5 (1=very dry, 5=very oily)

cheek_texture.description: Cheek area texture: smooth, rough, flaky, tight, or normal

pore_visibility.description: Overall pore visibility on scale 1-5 (1=barely visible, 5=very prominent)

makeup_longevity.description: Hours makeup typically lasts without touch-ups (1-12)

washing_frequency.description: Times face is washed per day (1-5)

reaction_tendency.description: Whether skin frequently reacts to new products

error_messages: Invalid scale value: tzone_oiliness and pore_visibility must be integers between 1-5.
Invalid texture type: cheek_texture must be one of [smooth, rough, flaky, tight, normal].
Invalid frequency: makeup_longevity must be between 1-12 hours, washing_frequency must be between 1-5 times.
Missing required parameter: All parameters are required for accurate skin type classification.
usage: Provide all six skin characteristic parameters to receive a comprehensive skin type classification with confidence score and supporting rationale.
